item.title: Mahindra and Mahindra (M&M) Q2FY23 Results: The YoY Profit Increased by 21%
item.description: Mahindra and Mahindra (M&M) Q2FY23 results are announced today. The results are submitted to the exchanges today, 11th November 2022.
